text: @sunnydayz_66 @BorisJohnson @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @EnvHealthNews @MattHancock @stopthestink 2/2 There definitely will be other gases coming out of that landfill, whenever I’ve smelt it smells of a mixture of things not just the standard hydrogen sulphide smell(rotten eggs). @LucyABeaumont @EnvAgencyNW Thanks so much for highlighting our plight... the community can't thank you enough 🙏🏼 #StopTheStink
